divs: Sighting Detailsheading west on hwy 119 at about 15:00 - 15:15, in Longmont,CO. lookin at the mtns and witness 3 objects, one at 11 o'clock (hovering), one at 4 o'clock (moving north slowly) and one in the middle rotating from side to side or like a wobble. I could see the middle of craft when it did this. Guessing that they may have about 30 miles from me and guessing thier size to be 150 to 200 ft in diameter. Just wondering if anybody besides me that saw this..
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Longmont
There were no other sightings in Longmont on or around August 5th 2011
